titleStmt.title: A short treatise concerning the exposition of those words of Christ, Tell the Church, &c. Mat. 18. 17. Written by Francis Iohnson, pastor of the English exiled Church at Amsterdam in the low countreyes.

publicationStmt.date: Printed in the yeare of our Lord, 1611.

notesStmt.note: Suggested place of publication from STC.
Title vignette is McK. 379 without initials; headpiece, initial.
The item at reel 2340:8h is eighth in a group of ten items bound and filmed together.
Reproductions of the originals in: British Library (reel 754:11) and Boston Public Library (reel 2340:8h).
